nodes.text: Scavenger Hunt is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle as New Republic troops on Coruscant attempt to prevent a group of Scavengers from dismantling their transport, while contending with the scavengers, their war droid and a pack of nek battle beasts.

During an assault on Coruscant by the Imperial Ruling Council, New Republic troops must prevent a group of Scavengers from dismantling their transport, while contending with the scavengers, their war droid and a pack of nek battle beasts.
